result: Football: “Rebellion is that it changes the world” know the story of Afonsinho, the first Brazilian football player to defeat the cartolage and to win the free pass, exactly 40 years ago was retiring for the first time for the first time , then with the Santos shirt (because then he would play again for the New York Cosmos, from the United States) in 1972, when he was asked if he finally felt a free man. The king answered without hesitation: - Free man in football I only know one: Afonsinho. This one can say, using his words, that he gave the cry of independence or death. No one else. The rest is talk.
